pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'C++' Header Files for Color Conversion and Color Mappings // Provides 'C++' header files to deal with color conversion from some color spaces to hexadecimal with 'Rcpp', and exports some color mapping functions for usage in R. Also exports functions to convert colors from the 'HSLuv' color space for usage in R. 'HSLuv' is a human-friendly alternative to HSL.
